channel.title: Zelda: Skyward Sword on PacoChan's Website

item.title: The Legend of Zelda: Skyward Sword - Game-Breaking Bug Fix (Wii)
item.description: At a certain point toward the end of the Legend of Zelda Skyward Sword, while collecting pieces of a certain Song, you’re tasked with visiting the Fire, Water and Thunder Dragons in any order you choose.
